| HistoryText             = The division of the mercenary organization [[Mercenary Organization Dedicated Only to Killing (Earth-616)|M.O.D.O.K.]] who would later be rebranded as Poole Boys was composed of foot soldiers. They got so little action they barely left their rooms, and M.O.D.O.K.'s newest recruit [[Gwendolyn Poole (Earth-TRN565)|Gwen Poole]] didn't even know of its existence.

[[File:Poole Boys (Earth-616) from Unbelievable Gwenpool Vol 1 9 001.jpg|thumb|left|Original uniforms]]
While panning a counterattack on the invading alien army of [[Teuthidans]], who had captured M.O.D.O.K.'s top operatives, Gwen Poole found out about the existence of these members.{{r|Unbelievable Gwenpool Vol 1 9}} She deployed them to kill the Teuthidans foot soldiers, having rebranded them as the Poole Boys, and having given them new uniforms based on [[Gwenpool's Suit|hers]]. Even though the Poole Boys proved to be extremely efficient against the Teuthidans, most of them were arrested by the police afterwards.{{r|Unbelievable Gwenpool Vol 1 10}}

The Poole Boys later reunited with the rest of the former M.O.D.O.K. agents in anticipation for [[M.O.D.O.K. Superior (Earth-616)|M.O.D.O.K. Superior]]'s return to [[Earth]]. He swore revenge upon them only for their collective might to scare him off.{{r|Unbelievable Gwenpool Vol 1 25}}
